Global Variable# AVEncoderBitRatePerChannelKey

iOS 4.0+iPadOS 4.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.7+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
let AVEncoderBitRatePerChannelKey: String
```
